More Service Cloud Features

You can show agents that you care about their well-being by allowing them to specify daily operating hours they prefer to work. This is done through Service Resource Preferences, which are considered when a team lead assigns shifts using scheduling tools.

Workforce Engagement is available in Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited Editions
Shift Scheduling is available in the Contact Center SKU, Einstein 1 Service Edition, and Service Suites

After setting up service resource preferences, agents can specify days and times they want to work. When planners assign agents to shifts, the scheduling tools consider each agent's preference.

Submit a Service Resource Preference that reflects your desired hours of work. When planners schedule shifts, their preferences are taken into account.
title: Service Resource Preferences in Service Cloud
